review: Installed easily, found my wi-fi and connected, snappy performance, all good. It even was able to power from one of the USB ports on the TV. No need to find a wall outlet.The Android app works great as a remote control.
author: Rob B,

review: Blows Chromecast away!  Easy set up, easy navigation, great selection.
author: DJBRyce

review: I've only had this for a few days so I can't do a thorough review yet but so far I am not that impressed.  I've been using the Apple TV for awhile and bought the Fire stick to test it out in hopes of it being a hit so I could buy a few more as Christmas gifts.  The price is great and the remote is slightly bigger than the Apple TV's remote so it's easier to use but the interface is harder to navigate through.
author: Jean

review: Great product better than the chromecast love it
author: JOSE CABA

review: Super easy set up!  Bought this to replace a Roku and am so happy I did.  I recently tried a chrome cast and the set up on that was terrible.  This fire stick was very easy to set up and works great.
author: Jenn E

review: An interesting item, but competing in a market already loaded with many other choices for the same purpose. Got at the intro price so no real complaints about the quality and results. Seems like a good option to take along when traveling. Will be trying out on some upcoming trips.
author: E. C. Fenn "Gizmo nut"

review: It arrived in the hassle free Amazon packaging.  I didn't have to break out scissors and knives to get it out.  Set up was a breeze.  Having the dongle extension included made hooking it up to the tv easier.  Amazons side scrolling interface works fine. It loads and plays pretty fast for the size of it. I purchased this because the price was good and I needed something for traveling purposes.  The only disappointment I had with this was I cannot play minecraft on it.
author: Chris

review: One comment: Fire TV Stick DOES work with a Receiver's HDMI port, I called Amazon about this issue they said it would have to be a direct connection. So FAR it's working perfectly fine.(Onkyo TX-SR313 5.1- Channel Home Theater A/V Receiver, Black )
author: L. Klindt "Real_Ramit"

review: Don't get me wrong I like this device, and it works well, I just wish it was not as tied to the whole Amazon ecosystem as much as it is. I also find the interface a tad clunky, when compared to other Android TV HDMI sticks. Maybe with future updates they could include a app drawer. I ordered this for the 19 dollar promotion so I have no complaints. At full price, I would rather spend the extra money to buy the Roku stick.Update...01/23/2015 After owning this device for two months, I stand by my previous review. Streaming apps work great, Amazon instant streaming, Netflix, Espn, YouTube ect. Please overhaul terrible User Interface, I should not have to click on a app twice to open it. (first click to open title card, second click to launch app)The YouTube app could have a better layout as well. Streaming is very fast on this device. I would like another Stick for upstairs TV, no way would I spend $40 for it.
author: Tacitblue
